title: Paramount Plus Schedule November 18-24 2024: New TV Shows & Movies Being Added
description: Paramount Plus‘ new TV and movie releases for November 18-24 2024 include The French Montana Story Premiere and Jersey Shore Family Vacation Season 7. On November 19, subscribers can tune into Paramount Plus to check out The French Montana Story. This music documentary movie is helmed by Mandon Lovett, who previously worked on projects like […] The post Paramount Plus Schedule November 18-24 2024: New TV Shows & Movies Being Added appeared first on ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More.
author: Abdul Azim Naushad
excerpt: Fans curious about Paramount Plus' weekly schedule for November 18-24 2024 and the movie and TV show releases can learn more here.
siteName: ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More
text: Paramount Plus‘ new TV and movie releases for November 18-24 2024 include The French Montana Story Premiere and Jersey Shore Family Vacation Season 7. On November 19, subscribers can tune into Paramount Plus to check out The French Montana Story. This music documentary movie is helmed by Mandon Lovett, who previously worked on projects like RapCaviar Presents, PREACHERMAN, and Life & Basketball: The Rise of Lethal Shooter. The story follows the rise and fame of Moroccan diamond-selling rapper French Montana. It depicts his harsh and poverty-ridden early childhood, where he and his two brothers were under the sole care of their mother in the Bronx after their father abandoned them. The documentary film also takes place in multiple locations across the globe. Then, November 20 will see Jersey Shore Family Vacation Season 7 drop on the streamer. Created by SallyAnn Salsano and Anthony Beltempo, the series follows the Jersey Shore cast, who after having promised each other they would go on a vacation together, enjoy their vacation at a house in Miami Beach. Also coming out on Paramount Plus this week is Mr. Brooks. It is a crime thriller following a serial killer Earl Brooks (Kevin Costner), who is often controlled and encouraged to embrace violence and murder by his ruthless and vicious alter-ego. It also features Demi Moore, Dane Cook, William Hurt, Marg Helgenberger, Danielle Panabaker, and Matt Schulze. New Paramount Plus releases for November 18-24 2024 Below are all the new TV shows and movies being added to Paramount Plus from November 18-24 2024. November 19 The French Montana Story Premiere November 20 Jersey Shore Family Vacation (Season 7) November 22 Mr. Brooks For more Paramount Plus content, learn when Jack Black’s Dear Santa is releasing on the platform. Also, a new iCarly project is in the works according to star Miranda Cosgrove.
html:
Paramount Plus‘ new TV and movie releases for November 18-24 2024 include The French Montana Story Premiere and Jersey Shore Family Vacation Season 7.

On November 19, subscribers can tune into Paramount Plus to check out The French Montana Story. This music documentary movie is helmed by Mandon Lovett, who previously worked on projects like RapCaviar Presents, PREACHERMAN, and Life & Basketball: The Rise of Lethal Shooter. The story follows the rise and fame of Moroccan diamond-selling rapper French Montana. It depicts his harsh and poverty-ridden early childhood, where he and his two brothers were under the sole care of their mother in the Bronx after their father abandoned them. The documentary film also takes place in multiple locations across the globe.

Then, November 20 will see Jersey Shore Family Vacation Season 7 drop on the streamer. Created by SallyAnn Salsano and Anthony Beltempo, the series follows the Jersey Shore cast, who after having promised each other they would go on a vacation together, enjoy their vacation at a house in Miami Beach.

Also coming out on Paramount Plus this week is Mr. Brooks. It is a crime thriller following a serial killer Earl Brooks (Kevin Costner), who is often controlled and encouraged to embrace violence and murder by his ruthless and vicious alter-ego. It also features Demi Moore, Dane Cook, William Hurt, Marg Helgenberger, Danielle Panabaker, and Matt Schulze.

New Paramount Plus releases for November 18-24 2024

Below are all the new TV shows and movies being added to Paramount Plus from November 18-24 2024.

November 19

  • The French Montana Story Premiere

November 20

  • Jersey Shore Family Vacation (Season 7)

November 22

  • Mr. Brooks

For more Paramount Plus content, learn when Jack Black’s Dear Santa is releasing on the platform. Also, a new iCarly project is in the works according to star Miranda Cosgrove.
